name: SPLITTER
body:
### About
Wellcome to SPLITTER download page. Here you can find the source code, the user's manual, optional scipts for RADseq analisys and example data to test SPLITTER.

### Support
Find help and support in the forum [SPLITTER-Support](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/splitter-support)

### Citation
Please don't forget to cite SPLITTER.
Ricardo Arraiano-Castilho, Michael R. Miller, Albano Beja-Pereira (2014) SPLITTER: a pipeline for RADseq preliminary analysis (Submitted to Bioinformatics)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
